title: Defending Chermorg
body:
well you know, its a tutorial to get more down votes then EA, well anyways. https://kotaku.com/ea-defense-of-star-wars-battlefront-ii-becomes-most-dow-1820396527

Chermorg is doing is job very well, I don't understand why he is getting criticism and down votes, i understand that some of his comments can be aggressive-ish, but its nothing bad (i did my fair share of research on him and his history) if he is still on the team that means he hasn't violated any of the volunteer rules, and alot of people (me included) like him!

its perfectly natural to be aggressive with the truth.
